body_html:
The all-sum documentation mentions that you need to evaluate all outputs, otherwise it will hang. You are not evaluating x_temp.

Also, all_sum should not be called under a device context. All (GPU) devices of the inputs automatically participate in this op.
body_text:
The all-sum documentation mentions that you need to evaluate all outputs, otherwise it will hang. You are not evaluating x_temp.
Also, all_sum should not be called under a device context. All (GPU) devices of the inputs automatically participate in this op.
body:
The all-sum documentation mentions that you need to evaluate all outputs, otherwise it will hang. You are not evaluating x_temp.

Also, all_sum should not be called under a device context. All (GPU) devices of the inputs automatically participate in this op.
